price: But they wonder that a warner has come to them from among themselves, so the disbelievers say, “This is something strange!
arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: bal ʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum faqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā shayon ʿajībun
